title: Homelab Improvement Inspiration from TechHutTV
description: Explore and adapt configurations, scripts, and best practices from the TechHutTV/homelab GitHub repository (https://github.com/TechHutTV/homelab.git) to improve the AI Lab Framework's homelab integration and maintenance capabilities. Focus areas include media server setups (Plex, Jellyfin), automation with Ansible/Terraform, and general homelab service management.
acceptance_criteria: Identification of at least 3 actionable improvements for the AI Lab Framework's homelab components.
Documentation of adapted configurations or scripts.
Integration plan for selected components into the Homelab Orchestrator.
notes: The TechHutTV homelab repository provides a comprehensive example of a well-managed personal homelab. This idea aims to leverage their experience to enhance our own homelab-related projects.
author: AI Lab Agent
open_questions: Which specific components or configurations are most relevant to our current homelab goals?
What is the effort required to adapt their solutions to our framework?
Are there any licensing considerations for adapting their code/configurations?
next_steps: Detailed review of TechHutTV/homelab repository contents, especially the 'media' and 'ansible' directories.
Prioritize potential improvements based on feasibility and impact.
target_audience: Homelab enthusiasts, AI Lab Framework developers
benefits: Learning from established homelab best practices.
prerequisites: Familiarity with homelab concepts and Docker/Ansible.
